|brand = GlobalScale |model = D3 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 003-D3P001 |wlclass = AN300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88AP510;(ARMADA 500) Dove; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v7 |cpu1_type_rev = (PJ4 core) |cpu1spd = 933<!-- 800 / 1000 MHz --> |gpu1chip1 = Vivante;GC600; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G2FE3R-B001; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L1606EM2I-12G; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Elpida;J2108BCSE-DJ-F; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:AD:4E |oui = 00:50:43
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.08;Marvell v5.4.4; |stockos = Linux;3.4.2;Ubuntu 10.02;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, mSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, J16
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, USB 3.0 / xHCI Host Controller;Fresco Logic;FL1009;;1;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, Low Spurious Multiclock Generator for Audio;Asahi Kasei;AK8128;;1;,,, 12V 4.5A 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;5;,,, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;3;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = nosoup4u |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2013 |estprice = 200 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8782; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "D3_PLUG_V3-0-0", "GLOBALSCALE TECHNOLOGIES,INC" and :"WWW.GLOBALSCALETECHNOLOGIES.COM" are silkscreened on board bottom.
{{See also|GlobalScale D2Plug|GlobalScale Devices|GlobalScale}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @933MHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0/ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC), 2MB Serial Flash, mSATA port *Memory: [[Elpida]] 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Wi-Fi: [[Marvell]] 88W8782 802.11abgn *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 12V/2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/GlobalscaleTechnologiesInc/D3-Firmware ''D3-Firmware'' on '''GitHub'''] *[https://github.com/GlobalscaleTechnologiesInc/D3-Linux ''D3-Linux'' on '''GitHub''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:GlobalScale D3 Top.jpeg|Board top File:GlobalScale D3 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
